sub_title: Business/Functional Analyst | Banking | Payments | Order Management | ISO 20022 | SEPA | SCRUM |
summary:
•	A result oriented professional with 10 years of experience across multiple Core Banking assignments for Business,Functional & Technical Analysis, Payment Systems, Migration and Implementation in banking and financial services domain.
•	Experience in the Payment systems and Clearing operations processes for European markets; successfully handled a project for J.P. Morgan(U.K),two projects for Deutsche Bank(Singapore) and currently handling a project for ING Bank(The Netherlands).
•   With a proven ability to build strong customer relationships and process coordination, I have handled various roles such as DevOps Engineer, Business Analyst, Quality Assurance Lead and Payments Consultant for large integration and separation projects, SEPA compliance.
•	Assisting Product Owner as and when required from initial stages of Epic Management - User Story creation, Planning, Defining Acceptance Criteria - to delivery of solutions
•	Worked closely with Business and IT stakeholder in multiple projects and actively participated in driving design discussions and demos with stakeholders.
•	Excellent communication, interpersonal, presentation & analytical skills to work efficiently.A flexible colleague that keeps the positive attitude.
•   I have expertise in successfully driving product features/functionality from inception to delivery of Channels to Order Manager to Payment Engines in Banking Applications.
•   I have 7 years of diverse International exposure with global banks in The Netherlands and Singapore.


Skills:
Project Management : Stakeholder Management, Planning, Transition, Implementation, Risk, Resourcing & Reporting, DevOps, Continuous Delivery, Continuous Integration, Agile WoW
Domain Knowledge   : Wholesale & Retail Payments (predominantly European Banking) 
Functional Skills  : Business & Functional Analysis, Creating Functional Design Documents (FDD),  Understanding Business Requirements and Scope, Prioritized Requirements List (PRL), Refinement, Assisting UAT
Payments Expertise : SEPA, Instant payments, EEA payments, Direct Debits, Domestic payments, International Payments within EU. Experienced in PSD2 and good knowledge of Payments and Clearings.

Tools:
CI/CD Tools: Azure
Version Control: GIT, Azure
Cloud: ING Private Cloud, Azure
Artifact Repository: Artifactory
Tracking Tools: Jira, Confluence, Service Now
Testing Tools: ALM,HP QC
Methodology: Agile (Scrum)
Platform: Linux Redhat and Windows
Database : Oracle SQL 
Tracking Tools: Track & Trace (ING), Kibana, Grafana, Prometheus

school.name: National Institute of Science and Technology

profile_positions.description:
GIOM  - Global Instruction Order Manager
•	Actively participates in the Scrum meetings and manages, tests and deploys one or more applications and proactively monitors to identify and prevent operational problems.
•	Analyzed user stories for the CICD DevOps team to implement the solutions for entire lifecycle of GIOM functionalities. 
•	Collaborated with Business, Architects and DevOps squads to help translate Epics within a complex IT landscape into features, design solution, produce user stories, prioritize backlog and establish the delivery roadmap.
•	Involved in the Continuous Delivery process to improve the time-to-market delivery for quickly adding business value by delivering the business-solutions. 
•	Provided 2nd line support i.e resolving incidents during business hours as part of Incident Management process. Also, contributed towards standby shift that offers 24x7 support.
GIOM – RTPE Connectivity:
•	Contributed towards the design and implementation of SEPA Credit Transfer (Single, Batch and Mass) flows to migrate from mainframe based legacy payment engine including 365 days booking for SEPA countries.
•	Formulated the Solution Proposal  and delivered Internal Direct Debits feature, where it supports : single and multiple (file based) forced and non-forced : direct debits and credit transfers.
Open Banking  &  Payment Service Directive 2 – Regulatory Mandate
•	Managed PSD2 related features based on the API Touchpoint architecture.
•	Delivered key Approval workflow feature related to Authorisation of Single, Future dated and Bulk payment orders from Third Party Providers.
IT Risk Control:
•	Collected and registered auditable evidence material that complies to Key Controls as defined in ING IT Minimum Standards in appropriate tools (Operational Control Dashboard) and ensures that it remains up-to-date.
profile_positions.title: IT Engineer Proficient-Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Electronic Banking International Communication Standard (EBICS)
•	Collaborated with client requirements team to develop new functional capabilities, enhancements and operational workflows for Travic Product.
•	Involved in requirement gathering, delivered impact/ gap analysis and supported End to End functional testing. 
•	Coordinated Business, Development and Quality Assurance teams. 
•	Worked on various features for EBICS Germany, EBICS France (w.r.t data qualification, validations of inbound/outbound mapping for multiple formats)

European Corporate Electronic Banking (ECEB)
•	ECEB was an initiative to provide extra features like:   
-	Electronic Authorization of order files
-	Upload and Download of EBICS Order types
-	Manual capturing of SEPA Cancellation requests
-	Handling of respective feedback/status information
•	Liaised with stakeholders to understand functionality, mitigate risks, close information gaps and ensure timely solution delivery.
profile_positions.title: Functional Analyst

profile_positions.description:
As Test Analyst:
*******************
•	Understanding the business functional requirements i.e. Use Cases, BRD, Interface and CSM Variance documents.
•	Extraction of appropriate Test Conditions and Test Scenarios.
•	Preparing the Test Design steps and maintains them in QC according to the Current Release.
•	Reviewing Test Cases and the Test Steps to ensure coverage of the business requirements.
•	Providing Test Estimation plan for the different Test Scenarios.
•	Preparation of Test data based on the Interface documents.
•	Involved in smoke test on new patch, functional (END-to-END) testing as well as regression testing.
•	Understanding root cause/functionality of the production defects on various clearings for iPAY Program. Analyzing the issue and provide estimation on the same to client.
•	Re-testing the defects and execute the relative test cases based on their results in QC.
•	Tracking and managing the defects using QC.
•	Worked on HOT Fixes of various clearings.
•	Providing daily status reports to client on priority basis every SOD from Production Fix Team.
•	Weekly status meeting with client to provide the current weeks work/issue updates for Production Fix Team.
•	Attending defect calls, Clarification of queries from the business by attending query calls with the SME’s.

As Defect/Incident Owner:
******************************
•	Logging of defects in QC, tracking and reporting the raised defects.
•	Re-testing the fixed bug assigned in QC and followed up till closure.
•	Proving the defect for HOT fixes on old patch and re-testing them on new patch after the deployment.
•	Reporting of defects in internal defect triage call before assigning to Development team.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Specialist
